author: jericho
msg: - Change the method name, getAbsPath to getAbsPathQuery
Because the heir_path include query t, not abs_path.
- Be ready for URI encoding(not doing any encoding yet).
Sorry for the long commit messages.

author: jericho
msg: The hier_part without the qeury part is not recommended.
Because the PUT request use the hier_part of URI.
And it fails to uploading data.
By origin, these problems come from URI encoding.
The scope of URI encoding is being changed according to the part of URI.
It means that the characters as targets of encoding are different by the part.
If you have some trouble with using some HTTP request,
turn off  the URL encoding on the client side and try it out.
Then It's ok.  (It's dependent on the server side though)

author: juergen
msg: the headers were cleared before the request was sent, resulting in a deletion of already set headers (like if-modified). from version 1.4 to 1.5 this clear was introduced due to (sporadic) errors in case of re-sending the request. Possibly this error is aktiv again. Can someone give me a hint where to look for this re-sending?
